input.sentences: we went on a hiking tour as a family .
we took a break so that we could hydrate and get something to eat .
we were so glad to see the finish line of the hike .
we were heading to the lodging for our overnight stay .
the scenary was so beautiful on the tour .
output.sentences: This weekend, we took a hiking tour as a family.
We had to remember to take a break to eat and hydrate.
We hiked in a line, and I'm glad we did.
We decided to stay overnight in the provided lodging.
The scenery of the tour was beautiful.
